title: Scarlett Johansson | Don Jr. Bombs at CPAC as Crowd Cheers Low Vaccination Rates: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Conservative Political Action Conference attendees cheering low vaccination rates as COVID cases rise.

Then, Scarlett Johansson talks about showing her film Home Alone 3 to her daughter and getting married to Colin Jost during the pandemic.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
